title: Diversity Can Improve Stores' Sales Performance (UTD - The University of Texas at Dallas)
text: ( Source : UTD - The University of Texas at Dallas ) Text size: research Oct. 13, 2015 Matching levels of racial diversity between store employees and the surrounding community impacts the store unit's sales performance, according to a new
